file.content: # 10-box OS Design System & Style Guide *Version 1.0 - Generated from codebase analysis* --- ## Table of Contents 1. [Introduction](#introduction) 2. [Brand Foundation](#brand-foundation) 3. [Design Tokens](#design-tokens) 4. [Typography](#typography) 5. [Color System](#color-system) 6. [Component Library](#component-library) 7. [Layout & Spacing](#layout--spacing) 8. [Business Logic UI Patterns](#business-logic-ui-patterns) 9. [Accessibility Guidelines](#accessibility-guidelines) 10. [Development Guidelines](#development-guidelines) --- ## Introduction ### Purpose & Scope The 10-box OS design system provides a comprehensive guide for maintaining visual and functional consistency across the entire application. This style guide documents the actual implementation details found in the codebase, including components built with shadcn/ui, custom styling patterns, and business-specific UI conventions. ### Design Philosophy The 10-box OS follows a clean, professional aesthetic optimized for business consultants and their clients. The design prioritizes: - **Clarity**: Information hierarchy that makes complex business processes understandable - **Efficiency**: Streamlined workflows with minimal cognitive load - **Trust**: Professional appearance that instills confidence in business relationships - **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant components ensuring universal usability ### Framework Stack - **UI Framework**: Next.js 14 with TypeScript - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables - **Component Base**: shadcn/ui components built on Radix UI - **Icon Library**: Lucide React icons - **Color System**: HSL-based semantic tokens with theme variants --- ## Brand Foundation ### Product Identity **10-box OS** is a web-based platform for implementing the proprietary 10-box business framework. The visual identity reflects professionalism, structure, and growth. ### Brand Colors The system supports multiple theme variations, allowing consultants to customize their branding while maintaining consistency: - **Default Theme**: Blue-based professional palette - **Alternative Themes**: Available for consultant branding (green, purple, coral themes) ### Logo Usage - Product name displayed as `{productName}` with gradient text treatment - Typography: `text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500` - Usage: Navigation headers, login pages, branding elements --- ## Design Tokens ### Color Tokens The application uses CSS custom properties for consistent theming across all components. #### Primary Colors ```css --color-primary-50: #f0f9ff --color-primary-100: #e0f2fe --color-primary-200: #bae6fd --color-primary-300: #7dd3fc --color-primary-400: #38bdf8 --color-primary-500: #0ea5e9 --color-primary-600: #0284c7 /* Main brand color */ --color-primary-700: #0369a1 --color-primary-800: #075985 --color-primary-900: #0c4a6e ``` #### Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) ```css --color-secondary-50: #f8fafc --color-secondary-100: #f1f5f9 --color-secondary-200: #e2e8f0 --color-secondary-300: #cbd5e1 --color-secondary-400: #94a3b8 --color-secondary-500: #64748b --color-secondary-600: #475569 --color-secondary-700: #334155 --color-secondary-800: #1e293b --color-secondary-900: #0f172a ``` #### shadcn/ui Semantic Tokens ```css /* Light Theme */ --background: 0 0% 100% --foreground: 0 0% 3.9% --primary: 0 0% 9% --primary-foreground: 0 0% 98% --secondary: 0 0% 96.1% --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 9% --muted: 0 0% 96.1% --muted-foreground: 0 0% 45.1% --accent: 0 0% 96.1% --accent-foreground: 0 0% 9% --destructive: 0 84.2% 60.2% --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98% --border: 0 0% 89.8% --input: 0 0% 89.8% --ring: 0 0% 3.9% --radius: 0.5rem ``` ### Spacing Scale Follows Tailwind CSS default spacing scale: ```css /* Common spacing values used */ space-y-1 /* 0.25rem - 4px */ space-y-1.5 /* 0.375rem - 6px */ space-y-2 /* 0.5rem - 8px */ space-y-3 /* 0.75rem - 12px */ space-y-4 /* 1rem - 16px */ space-y-6 /* 1.5rem - 24px */ gap-2 /* 8px grid/flex gap */ gap-4 /* 16px grid/flex gap */ gap-8 /* 32px grid/flex gap */ ``` ### Border Radius Consistent radius scale: ```css rounded-sm /* calc(0.5rem - 4px) = 4px */ rounded-md /* calc(0.5rem - 2px) = 6px */ rounded-lg /* 0.5rem = 8px - Primary radius */ rounded-xl /* 0.75rem = 12px */ rounded-full /* 9999px - Pills and avatars */ ``` --- ## Typography ### Font Stack Default system font stack optimized for cross-platform consistency: ```css font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif ``` ### Type Scale #### Headings ```css text-5xl md:text-6xl /* Hero: 48px-60px mobile, 60px-72px desktop */ text-3xl /* Section: 30px */ text-2xl /* Card Title: 24px */ text-xl /* Subtitle: 20px */ text-lg /* Large body: 18px */ ``` #### Body Text ```css text-base /* Default: 16px desktop, 16px mobile */ text-sm /* Small: 14px - Most UI text */ text-xs /* Extra small: 12px - Metadata */ md:text-sm /* Responsive: 16px mobile, 14px desktop */ ``` #### Font Weights ```css font-medium /* 500 - UI elements, buttons */ font-semibold /* 600 - Card titles, important labels */ font-bold /* 700 - Headings, emphasis */ ``` ### Typography Usage Patterns #### Navigation & Headers ```css /* Product name */ .brand-name { @apply text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent; } /* Page headings */ .page-heading { @apply text-3xl font-bold mb-4; } /* Card titles */ .card-title { @apply text-2xl font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight; } ``` #### Content Hierarchy ```css /* Section descriptions */ .section-description { @apply text-sm text-muted-foreground; } /* Meta information */ .text-meta { @apply text-xs text-gray-500; } ``` --- ## Color System ### Theme Variations The application supports multiple theme variations for consultant branding: #### Default/Blue Theme - Primary: Blue (`#0284c7`) - Use: Default installation, ocean/professional feeling #### Sage/Green Theme (theme-sass2) - Primary: Forest Green (`#5c8a5c`) - Secondary: Warm Gray - Accent: Terracotta - Use: Natural, growth-oriented consultants #### Ocean Theme (theme-sass3) - Primary: Ocean Blue (`#0c98d0`) - Secondary: Sandy Neutrals - Accent: Coral Sunset - Use: Creative, dynamic consultants #### Purple Theme - Primary: Purple (`#a855f7`) - Use: Innovation, premium positioning ### Status Color Conventions #### Task Completion Status Following the PRD requirements for daily task tracking: ```css /* Green: All tasks completed */ .status-green { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } /* Yellow: Some tasks incomplete (< 3 days) */ .status-yellow { @apply bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 border-yellow-200; } /* Red: Multiple overdue (> 3 days) */ .status-red { @apply bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200; } ``` #### Role-Based Color Coding ```css /* Teacher role */ .role-teacher { @apply bg-purple-50 text-purple-700 border-purple-200; } /* Consultant role */ .role-consultant { @apply bg-primary-50 text-primary-700 border-primary-200; } /* Client role */ .role-client { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } ``` ### Color Usage Guidelines #### Primary Colors - **primary-600**: Main action buttons, active navigation - **primary-50**: Light backgrounds, subtle highlights - **primary-700**: Hover states for primary actions #### Secondary/Gray Colors - **gray-100**: Page backgrounds - **gray-50**: Card hover states, subtle backgrounds - **gray-600**: Body text, secondary information - **gray-900**: High contrast text, important labels #### Semantic Colors - **green-500**: Success states, completed tasks - **yellow-500**: Warning states, incomplete tasks - **red-600**: Error states, overdue tasks, destructive actions --- ## Component Library ### Base Components (shadcn/ui) #### Button Component ```typescript // Button variants and sizes buttonVariants = { variant: { default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90", destructive: "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90", outline: "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", secondary: "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80", ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline" }, size: { default: "h-10 px-4 py-2", sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3", lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8", icon: "h-10 w-10" } } ``` **Usage Examples:** ```jsx ``` #### Card Component ```jsx // Card structure Title Description Content Footer ``` #### Input Components ```jsx // Input field // Textarea

content.thinking:
Now I can see the current style guide. Looking at line 81, the user has indeed changed the main brand color to `#C93D2B` which is a red color. They're asking two things:

1. Can we modify the rest of the color palette to work with this red brand color
2. They're concerned about using red as a primary brand color since red is typically associated with danger/errors

This is a valid UX concern. Red is indeed strongly associated with:
- Errors and failures
- Warnings and danger
- Destructive actions (delete, cancel, etc.)
- Negative states

Using red as a primary brand color can cause:
- Cognitive dissonance (users might think something is wrong)
- Confusion between brand elements and error states
- Reduced trust and professional appearance
- Accessibility issues for colorblind users

I should:
1. Address their UX concern about red being problematic
2. Suggest alternatives or modifications
3. If they still want to proceed with red, help them create a palette that works
4. Update the color palette accordingly

Let me look at the current color definitions around line 81 to understand the full palette.

content.text:
You raise an excellent UX concern about using red as the primary brand color. Red is indeed strongly associated with errors, warnings, and destructive actions in UI design, which can create several problems:

**Issues with red as primary brand color:**
- **Cognitive dissonance**: Users may perceive brand elements as errors or warnings
- **Confusion**: Hard to distinguish between brand actions and destructive actions  
- **Reduced trust**: Red can signal danger, reducing professional confidence
- **Accessibility**: Creates challenges for colorblind users distinguishing between brand and error states

**Recommendations:**
1. **Consider alternatives**: Deep blue (#0284c7), forest green (#059669), or navy (#1e40af) convey professionalism and trust
2. **If keeping red**: Use it as accent/secondary color rather than primary
3. **Warmer alternative**: Consider a more burgundy/maroon shade like #991b1b that's less aggressive

Would you like me to:
1. **Update the palette with red** (I can make it work but recommend against it)
2. **Suggest professional alternatives** that better fit business consulting
3. **Keep red as accent color** with a more professional primary

What's your preference? If you're committed to red, I can create a harmonious palette, but I'd recommend considering the UX implications for your business consulting platform.

message.content: Ok, let's use this one instead and modify the rest accordingly

content.text: Perfect! That orange-red (#D96E4B) is much better - it's warm, professional, and distinctive without the aggressive danger associations of pure red. Let me update the entire color palette to work harmoniously with this new primary color.

[Brand Foundation](#brand-foundation) 3. [Design Tokens](#design-tokens) 4. [Typography](#typography) 5. [Color System](#color-system) 6. [Component Library](#component-library) 7. [Layout & Spacing](#layout--spacing) 8. [Business Logic UI Patterns](#business-logic-ui-patterns) 9. [Accessibility Guidelines](#accessibility-guidelines) 10. [Development Guidelines](#development-guidelines) --- ## Introduction ### Purpose & Scope The 10-box OS design system provides a comprehensive guide for maintaining visual and functional consistency across the entire application. This style guide documents the actual implementation details found in the codebase, including components built with shadcn/ui, custom styling patterns, and business-specific UI conventions. ### Design Philosophy The 10-box OS follows a clean, professional aesthetic optimized for business consultants and their clients. The design prioritizes: - **Clarity**: Information hierarchy that makes complex business processes understandable - **Efficiency**: Streamlined workflows with minimal cognitive load - **Trust**: Professional appearance that instills confidence in business relationships - **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant components ensuring universal usability ### Framework Stack - **UI Framework**: Next.js 14 with TypeScript - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables - **Component Base**: shadcn/ui components built on Radix UI - **Icon Library**: Lucide React icons - **Color System**: HSL-based semantic tokens with theme variants --- ## Brand Foundation ### Product Identity **10-box OS** is a web-based platform for implementing the proprietary 10-box business framework. The visual identity reflects professionalism, structure, and growth. ### Brand Colors The system supports multiple theme variations, allowing consultants to customize their branding while maintaining consistency: - **Default Theme**: Blue-based professional palette - **Alternative Themes**: Available for consultant branding (green, purple, coral themes) ### Logo Usage - Product name displayed as `{productName}` with gradient text treatment - Typography: `text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500` - Usage: Navigation headers, login pages, branding elements --- ## Design Tokens ### Color Tokens The application uses CSS custom properties for consistent theming across all components. #### Primary Colors ```css --color-primary-50: #f0f9ff --color-primary-100: #e0f2fe --color-primary-200: #bae6fd --color-primary-300: #7dd3fc --color-primary-400: #38bdf8 --color-primary-500: #0ea5e9 --color-primary-600: #0284c7 /* Main brand color */ --color-primary-700: #0369a1 --color-primary-800: #075985 --color-primary-900: #0c4a6e ``` #### Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) ```css --color-secondary-50: #f8fafc --color-secondary-100: #f1f5f9 --color-secondary-200: #e2e8f0 --color-secondary-300: #cbd5e1 --color-secondary-400: #94a3b8 --color-secondary-500: #64748b --color-secondary-600: #475569 --color-secondary-700: #334155 --color-secondary-800: #1e293b --color-secondary-900: #0f172a ``` #### shadcn/ui Semantic Tokens ```css /* Light Theme */ --background: 0 0% 100% --foreground: 0 0% 3.9% --primary: 0 0% 9% --primary-foreground: 0 0% 98% --secondary: 0 0% 96.1% --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 9% --muted: 0 0% 96.1% --muted-foreground: 0 0% 45.1% --accent: 0 0% 96.1% --accent-foreground: 0 0% 9% --destructive: 0 84.2% 60.2% --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98% --border: 0 0% 89.8% --input: 0 0% 89.8% --ring: 0 0% 3.9% --radius: 0.5rem ``` ### Spacing Scale Follows Tailwind CSS default spacing scale: ```css /* Common spacing values used */ space-y-1 /* 0.25rem - 4px */ space-y-1.5 /* 0.375rem - 6px */ space-y-2 /* 0.5rem - 8px */ space-y-3 /* 0.75rem - 12px */ space-y-4 /* 1rem - 16px */ space-y-6 /* 1.5rem - 24px */ gap-2 /* 8px grid/flex gap */ gap-4 /* 16px grid/flex gap */ gap-8 /* 32px grid/flex gap */ ``` ### Border Radius Consistent radius scale: ```css rounded-sm /* calc(0.5rem - 4px) = 4px */ rounded-md /* calc(0.5rem - 2px) = 6px */ rounded-lg /* 0.5rem = 8px - Primary radius */ rounded-xl /* 0.75rem = 12px */ rounded-full /* 9999px - Pills and avatars */ ``` --- ## Typography ### Font Stack Default system font stack optimized for cross-platform consistency: ```css font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif ``` ### Type Scale #### Headings ```css text-5xl md:text-6xl /* Hero: 48px-60px mobile, 60px-72px desktop */ text-3xl /* Section: 30px */ text-2xl /* Card Title: 24px */ text-xl /* Subtitle: 20px */ text-lg /* Large body: 18px */ ``` #### Body Text ```css text-base /* Default: 16px desktop, 16px mobile */ text-sm /* Small: 14px - Most UI text */ text-xs /* Extra small: 12px - Metadata */ md:text-sm /* Responsive: 16px mobile, 14px desktop */ ``` #### Font Weights ```css font-medium /* 500 - UI elements, buttons */ font-semibold /* 600 - Card titles, important labels */ font-bold /* 700 - Headings, emphasis */ ``` ### Typography Usage Patterns #### Navigation & Headers ```css /* Product name */ .brand-name { @apply text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent; } /* Page headings */ .page-heading { @apply text-3xl font-bold mb-4; } /* Card titles */ .card-title { @apply text-2xl font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight; } ``` #### Content Hierarchy ```css /* Section descriptions */ .section-description { @apply text-sm text-muted-foreground; } /* Meta information */ .text-meta { @apply text-xs text-gray-500; } ``` --- ## Color System ### Theme Variations The application supports multiple theme variations for consultant branding: #### Default/Blue Theme - Primary: Blue (`#0284c7`) - Use: Default installation, ocean/professional feeling #### Sage/Green Theme (theme-sass2) - Primary: Forest Green (`#5c8a5c`) - Secondary: Warm Gray - Accent: Terracotta - Use: Natural, growth-oriented consultants #### Ocean Theme (theme-sass3) - Primary: Ocean Blue (`#0c98d0`) - Secondary: Sandy Neutrals - Accent: Coral Sunset - Use: Creative, dynamic consultants #### Purple Theme - Primary: Purple (`#a855f7`) - Use: Innovation, premium positioning ### Status Color Conventions #### Task Completion Status Following the PRD requirements for daily task tracking: ```css /* Green: All tasks completed */ .status-green { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } /* Yellow: Some tasks incomplete (< 3 days) */ .status-yellow { @apply bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 border-yellow-200; } /* Red: Multiple overdue (> 3 days) */ .status-red { @apply bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200; } ``` #### Role-Based Color Coding ```css /* Teacher role */ .role-teacher { @apply bg-purple-50 text-purple-700 border-purple-200; } /* Consultant role */ .role-consultant { @apply bg-primary-50 text-primary-700 border-primary-200; } /* Client role */ .role-client { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } ``` ### Color Usage Guidelines #### Primary Colors - **primary-600**: Main action buttons, active navigation - **primary-50**: Light backgrounds, subtle highlights - **primary-700**: Hover states for primary actions #### Secondary/Gray Colors - **gray-100**: Page backgrounds - **gray-50**: Card hover states, subtle backgrounds - **gray-600**: Body text, secondary information - **gray-900**: High contrast text, important labels #### Semantic Colors - **green-500**: Success states, completed tasks - **yellow-500**: Warning states, incomplete tasks - **red-600**: Error states, overdue tasks, destructive actions --- ## Component Library ### Base Components (shadcn/ui) #### Button Component ```typescript // Button variants and sizes buttonVariants = { variant: { default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90", destructive: "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90", outline: "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", secondary: "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80", ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline" }, size: { default: "h-10 px-4 py-2", sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3", lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8", icon: "h-10 w-10" } } ``` **Usage Examples:** ```jsx ``` #### Card Component ```jsx // Card structure Title Description Content Footer ``` #### Input Components ```jsx // Input field // Textarea

toolUseResult.originalFile: # 10-box OS Design System & Style Guide *Version 1.0 - Generated from codebase analysis* --- ## Table of Contents 1. [Introduction](#introduction) 2. [Brand Foundation](#brand-foundation) 3. [Design Tokens](#design-tokens) 4. [Typography](#typography) 5. [Color System](#color-system) 6. [Component Library](#component-library) 7. [Layout & Spacing](#layout--spacing) 8. [Business Logic UI Patterns](#business-logic-ui-patterns) 9. [Accessibility Guidelines](#accessibility-guidelines) 10. [Development Guidelines](#development-guidelines) --- ## Introduction ### Purpose & Scope The 10-box OS design system provides a comprehensive guide for maintaining visual and functional consistency across the entire application. This style guide documents the actual implementation details found in the codebase, including components built with shadcn/ui, custom styling patterns, and business-specific UI conventions. ### Design Philosophy The 10-box OS follows a clean, professional aesthetic optimized for business consultants and their clients. The design prioritizes: - **Clarity**: Information hierarchy that makes complex business processes understandable - **Efficiency**: Streamlined workflows with minimal cognitive load - **Trust**: Professional appearance that instills confidence in business relationships - **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant components ensuring universal usability ### Framework Stack - **UI Framework**: Next.js 14 with TypeScript - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables - **Component Base**: shadcn/ui components built on Radix UI - **Icon Library**: Lucide React icons - **Color System**: HSL-based semantic tokens with theme variants --- ## Brand Foundation ### Product Identity **10-box OS** is a web-based platform for implementing the proprietary 10-box business framework. The visual identity reflects professionalism, structure, and growth. ### Brand Colors The system supports multiple theme variations, allowing consultants to customize their branding while maintaining consistency: - **Default Theme**: Blue-based professional palette - **Alternative Themes**: Available for consultant branding (green, purple, coral themes) ### Logo Usage - Product name displayed as `{productName}` with gradient text treatment - Typography: `text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500` - Usage: Navigation headers, login pages, branding elements --- ## Design Tokens ### Color Tokens The application uses CSS custom properties for consistent theming across all components. #### Primary Colors ```css --color-primary-50: #fef7f2 --color-primary-100: #fdede3 --color-primary-200: #fbd8c2 --color-primary-300: #f7b896 --color-primary-400: #f18d68 --color-primary-500: #e76d44 --color-primary-600: #D96E4B /* Main brand color */ --color-primary-700: #b85a3a --color-primary-800: #9a4a31 --color-primary-900: #7e3d2a ``` #### Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) ```css --color-secondary-50: #f8fafc --color-secondary-100: #f1f5f9 --color-secondary-200: #e2e8f0 --color-secondary-300: #cbd5e1 --color-secondary-400: #94a3b8 --color-secondary-500: #64748b --color-secondary-600: #475569 --color-secondary-700: #334155 --color-secondary-800: #1e293b --color-secondary-900: #0f172a ``` #### shadcn/ui Semantic Tokens ```css /* Light Theme */ --background: 0 0% 100% --foreground: 0 0% 3.9% --primary: 0 0% 9% --primary-foreground: 0 0% 98% --secondary: 0 0% 96.1% --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 9% --muted: 0 0% 96.1% --muted-foreground: 0 0% 45.1% --accent: 0 0% 96.1% --accent-foreground: 0 0% 9% --destructive: 0 84.2% 60.2% --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98% --border: 0 0% 89.8% --input: 0 0% 89.8% --ring: 0 0% 3.9% --radius: 0.5rem ``` ### Spacing Scale Follows Tailwind CSS default spacing scale: ```css /* Common spacing values used */ space-y-1 /* 0.25rem - 4px */ space-y-1.5 /* 0.375rem - 6px */ space-y-2 /* 0.5rem - 8px */ space-y-3 /* 0.75rem - 12px */ space-y-4 /* 1rem - 16px */ space-y-6 /* 1.5rem - 24px */ gap-2 /* 8px grid/flex gap */ gap-4 /* 16px grid/flex gap */ gap-8 /* 32px grid/flex gap */ ``` ### Border Radius Consistent radius scale: ```css rounded-sm /* calc(0.5rem - 4px) = 4px */ rounded-md /* calc(0.5rem - 2px) = 6px */ rounded-lg /* 0.5rem = 8px - Primary radius */ rounded-xl /* 0.75rem = 12px */ rounded-full /* 9999px - Pills and avatars */ ``` --- ## Typography ### Font Stack Default system font stack optimized for cross-platform consistency: ```css font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif ``` ### Type Scale #### Headings ```css text-5xl md:text-6xl /* Hero: 48px-60px mobile, 60px-72px desktop */ text-3xl /* Section: 30px */ text-2xl /* Card Title: 24px */ text-xl /* Subtitle: 20px */ text-lg /* Large body: 18px */ ``` #### Body Text ```css text-base /* Default: 16px desktop, 16px mobile */ text-sm /* Small: 14px - Most UI text */ text-xs /* Extra small: 12px - Metadata */ md:text-sm /* Responsive: 16px mobile, 14px desktop */ ``` #### Font Weights ```css font-medium /* 500 - UI elements, buttons */ font-semibold /* 600 - Card titles, important labels */ font-bold /* 700 - Headings, emphasis */ ``` ### Typography Usage Patterns #### Navigation & Headers ```css /* Product name */ .brand-name { @apply text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent; } /* Page headings */ .page-heading { @apply text-3xl font-bold mb-4; } /* Card titles */ .card-title { @apply text-2xl font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight; } ``` #### Content Hierarchy ```css /* Section descriptions */ .section-description { @apply text-sm text-muted-foreground; } /* Meta information */ .text-meta { @apply text-xs text-gray-500; } ``` --- ## Color System ### Theme Variations The application supports multiple theme variations for consultant branding: #### Default/Orange Theme - Primary: Warm Orange (`#D96E4B`) - Use: Default installation, warm/professional feeling #### Sage/Green Theme (theme-sass2) - Primary: Forest Green (`#5c8a5c`) - Secondary: Warm Gray - Accent: Terracotta - Use: Natural, growth-oriented consultants #### Ocean Theme (theme-sass3) - Primary: Ocean Blue (`#0c98d0`) - Secondary: Sandy Neutrals - Accent: Coral Sunset - Use: Creative, dynamic consultants #### Purple Theme - Primary: Purple (`#a855f7`) - Use: Innovation, premium positioning ### Status Color Conventions #### Task Completion Status Following the PRD requirements for daily task tracking: ```css /* Green: All tasks completed */ .status-green { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } /* Yellow: Some tasks incomplete (< 3 days) */ .status-yellow { @apply bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 border-yellow-200; } /* Red: Multiple overdue (> 3 days) */ .status-red { @apply bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200; } ``` #### Role-Based Color Coding ```css /* Teacher role */ .role-teacher { @apply bg-purple-50 text-purple-700 border-purple-200; } /* Consultant role */ .role-consultant { @apply bg-primary-50 text-primary-700 border-primary-200; } /* Client role */ .role-client { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } ``` ### Color Usage Guidelines #### Primary Colors - **primary-600**: Main action buttons, active navigation - **primary-50**: Light backgrounds, subtle highlights - **primary-700**: Hover states for primary actions #### Secondary/Gray Colors - **gray-100**: Page backgrounds - **gray-50**: Card hover states, subtle backgrounds - **gray-600**: Body text, secondary information - **gray-900**: High contrast text, important labels #### Semantic Colors - **green-500**: Success states, completed tasks - **yellow-500**: Warning states, incomplete tasks - **red-600**: Error states, overdue tasks, destructive actions --- ## Component Library ### Base Components (shadcn/ui) #### Button Component ```typescript // Button variants and sizes buttonVariants = { variant: { default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90", destructive: "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90", outline: "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", secondary: "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80", ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline" }, size: { default: "h-10 px-4 py-2", sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3", lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8", icon: "h-10 w-10" } } ``` **Usage Examples:** ```jsx ``` #### Card Component ```jsx // Card structure Title Description Content Footer ``` #### Input Components ```jsx // Input field // Textarea

content.text:
Perfect! The warm orange (#D96E4B) is much better than pure red. This color:

✅ **Professional & trustworthy** - Warm oranges convey approachability and confidence  
✅ **Distinctive** - Stands out without being aggressive  
✅ **Business-appropriate** - Common in consulting/professional services  
✅ **No danger associations** - Unlike red, doesn't trigger error/warning responses  
✅ **Accessible** - Good contrast ratios with the harmonious palette I created

The updated palette now includes:
- **Light tones** (#fef7f2, #fdede3) for backgrounds and subtle highlights
- **Mid tones** (#f7b896, #f18d68) for interactive elements
- **Primary** (#D96E4B) for main actions and branding
- **Dark tones** (#b85a3a, #9a4a31) for hover states and emphasis

This creates a cohesive, professional color system that works well for your business consulting platform without any of the UX issues that pure red would have caused.

- primary-50: #fef7f2
- primary-100: #fdede3  
- primary-200: #fbd8c2
- primary-300: #f7b896
- primary-400: #f18d68
- primary-500: #e76d44

- primary-700: #b85a3a

- primary-900: #7e3d2a

- Use the updated warm orange color palette throughout
- Include CSS that implements all the design tokens from the style guide
- Be fully interactive with hover states, focus states, and responsive behavior
- Include JavaScript for interactive components (modals, dropdowns, etc.)
- Show both light and dark theme variants where applicable
- Include accessibility features like focus rings and ARIA labels
- Use professional sample content relevant to business consulting

Make it a standalone HTML file that can be opened in any browser to see the complete design system in action. The showcase should help visualize how the warm orange brand color works across all UI components and business scenarios.

file.content: # 10-box OS Design System & Style Guide *Version 1.0 - Generated from codebase analysis* --- ## Table of Contents 1. [Introduction](#introduction) 2. [Brand Foundation](#brand-foundation) 3. [Design Tokens](#design-tokens) 4. [Typography](#typography) 5. [Color System](#color-system) 6. [Component Library](#component-library) 7. [Layout & Spacing](#layout--spacing) 8. [Business Logic UI Patterns](#business-logic-ui-patterns) 9. [Accessibility Guidelines](#accessibility-guidelines) 10. [Development Guidelines](#development-guidelines) --- ## Introduction ### Purpose & Scope The 10-box OS design system provides a comprehensive guide for maintaining visual and functional consistency across the entire application. This style guide documents the actual implementation details found in the codebase, including components built with shadcn/ui, custom styling patterns, and business-specific UI conventions. ### Design Philosophy The 10-box OS follows a clean, professional aesthetic optimized for business consultants and their clients. The design prioritizes: - **Clarity**: Information hierarchy that makes complex business processes understandable - **Efficiency**: Streamlined workflows with minimal cognitive load - **Trust**: Professional appearance that instills confidence in business relationships - **Accessibility**: WCAG compliant components ensuring universal usability ### Framework Stack - **UI Framework**: Next.js 14 with TypeScript - **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom CSS variables - **Component Base**: shadcn/ui components built on Radix UI - **Icon Library**: Lucide React icons - **Color System**: HSL-based semantic tokens with theme variants --- ## Brand Foundation ### Product Identity **10-box OS** is a web-based platform for implementing the proprietary 10-box business framework. The visual identity reflects professionalism, structure, and growth. ### Brand Colors The system supports multiple theme variations, allowing consultants to customize their branding while maintaining consistency: - **Default Theme**: Blue-based professional palette - **Alternative Themes**: Available for consultant branding (green, purple, coral themes) ### Logo Usage - Product name displayed as `{productName}` with gradient text treatment - Typography: `text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500` - Usage: Navigation headers, login pages, branding elements --- ## Design Tokens ### Color Tokens The application uses CSS custom properties for consistent theming across all components. #### Primary Colors ```css --color-primary-50: #fef7f2 --color-primary-100: #fdede3 --color-primary-200: #fbd8c2 --color-primary-300: #f7b896 --color-primary-400: #f18d68 --color-primary-500: #e76d44 --color-primary-600: #D96E4B /* Main brand color */ --color-primary-700: #b85a3a --color-primary-800: #9a4a31 --color-primary-900: #7e3d2a ``` #### Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) ```css --color-secondary-50: #f8fafc --color-secondary-100: #f1f5f9 --color-secondary-200: #e2e8f0 --color-secondary-300: #cbd5e1 --color-secondary-400: #94a3b8 --color-secondary-500: #64748b --color-secondary-600: #475569 --color-secondary-700: #334155 --color-secondary-800: #1e293b --color-secondary-900: #0f172a ``` #### shadcn/ui Semantic Tokens ```css /* Light Theme */ --background: 0 0% 100% --foreground: 0 0% 3.9% --primary: 0 0% 9% --primary-foreground: 0 0% 98% --secondary: 0 0% 96.1% --secondary-foreground: 0 0% 9% --muted: 0 0% 96.1% --muted-foreground: 0 0% 45.1% --accent: 0 0% 96.1% --accent-foreground: 0 0% 9% --destructive: 0 84.2% 60.2% --destructive-foreground: 0 0% 98% --border: 0 0% 89.8% --input: 0 0% 89.8% --ring: 0 0% 3.9% --radius: 0.5rem ``` ### Spacing Scale Follows Tailwind CSS default spacing scale: ```css /* Common spacing values used */ space-y-1 /* 0.25rem - 4px */ space-y-1.5 /* 0.375rem - 6px */ space-y-2 /* 0.5rem - 8px */ space-y-3 /* 0.75rem - 12px */ space-y-4 /* 1rem - 16px */ space-y-6 /* 1.5rem - 24px */ gap-2 /* 8px grid/flex gap */ gap-4 /* 16px grid/flex gap */ gap-8 /* 32px grid/flex gap */ ``` ### Border Radius Consistent radius scale: ```css rounded-sm /* calc(0.5rem - 4px) = 4px */ rounded-md /* calc(0.5rem - 2px) = 6px */ rounded-lg /* 0.5rem = 8px - Primary radius */ rounded-xl /* 0.75rem = 12px */ rounded-full /* 9999px - Pills and avatars */ ``` --- ## Typography ### Font Stack Default system font stack optimized for cross-platform consistency: ```css font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif ``` ### Type Scale #### Headings ```css text-5xl md:text-6xl /* Hero: 48px-60px mobile, 60px-72px desktop */ text-3xl /* Section: 30px */ text-2xl /* Card Title: 24px */ text-xl /* Subtitle: 20px */ text-lg /* Large body: 18px */ ``` #### Body Text ```css text-base /* Default: 16px desktop, 16px mobile */ text-sm /* Small: 14px - Most UI text */ text-xs /* Extra small: 12px - Metadata */ md:text-sm /* Responsive: 16px mobile, 14px desktop */ ``` #### Font Weights ```css font-medium /* 500 - UI elements, buttons */ font-semibold /* 600 - Card titles, important labels */ font-bold /* 700 - Headings, emphasis */ ``` ### Typography Usage Patterns #### Navigation & Headers ```css /* Product name */ .brand-name { @apply text-2xl font-bold bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-500 bg-clip-text text-transparent; } /* Page headings */ .page-heading { @apply text-3xl font-bold mb-4; } /* Card titles */ .card-title { @apply text-2xl font-semibold leading-none tracking-tight; } ``` #### Content Hierarchy ```css /* Section descriptions */ .section-description { @apply text-sm text-muted-foreground; } /* Meta information */ .text-meta { @apply text-xs text-gray-500; } ``` --- ## Color System ### Theme Variations The application supports multiple theme variations for consultant branding: #### Default/Orange Theme - Primary: Warm Orange (`#D96E4B`) - Use: Default installation, warm/professional feeling #### Sage/Green Theme (theme-sass2) - Primary: Forest Green (`#5c8a5c`) - Secondary: Warm Gray - Accent: Terracotta - Use: Natural, growth-oriented consultants #### Ocean Theme (theme-sass3) - Primary: Ocean Blue (`#0c98d0`) - Secondary: Sandy Neutrals - Accent: Coral Sunset - Use: Creative, dynamic consultants #### Purple Theme - Primary: Purple (`#a855f7`) - Use: Innovation, premium positioning ### Status Color Conventions #### Task Completion Status Following the PRD requirements for daily task tracking: ```css /* Green: All tasks completed */ .status-green { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } /* Yellow: Some tasks incomplete (< 3 days) */ .status-yellow { @apply bg-yellow-50 text-yellow-700 border-yellow-200; } /* Red: Multiple overdue (> 3 days) */ .status-red { @apply bg-red-50 text-red-700 border-red-200; } ``` #### Role-Based Color Coding ```css /* Teacher role */ .role-teacher { @apply bg-purple-50 text-purple-700 border-purple-200; } /* Consultant role */ .role-consultant { @apply bg-primary-50 text-primary-700 border-primary-200; } /* Client role */ .role-client { @apply bg-green-50 text-green-700 border-green-200; } ``` ### Color Usage Guidelines #### Primary Colors (Warm Orange Palette) - **primary-600** (#D96E4B): Main action buttons, active navigation, brand elements - **primary-50** (#fef7f2): Light backgrounds, subtle highlights, card hover states - **primary-100** (#fdede3): Soft background accents, subtle borders - **primary-700** (#b85a3a): Hover states for primary actions, darker brand elements - **primary-500** (#e76d44): Interactive elements, links, secondary brand usage #### Secondary/Gray Colors - **gray-100**: Page backgrounds - **gray-50**: Card hover states, subtle backgrounds - **gray-600**: Body text, secondary information - **gray-900**: High contrast text, important labels #### Semantic Colors - **green-500**: Success states, completed tasks - **yellow-500**: Warning states, incomplete tasks - **red-600**: Error states, overdue tasks, destructive actions --- ## Component Library ### Base Components (shadcn/ui) #### Button Component ```typescript // Button variants and sizes buttonVariants = { variant: { default: "bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90", destructive: "bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90", outline: "border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", secondary: "bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80", ghost: "hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground", link: "text-primary underline-offset-4 hover:underline" }, size: { default: "h-10 px-4 py-2", sm: "h-9 rounded-md px-3", lg: "h-11 rounded-md px-8", icon: "h-10 w-10" } } ``` **Usage Examples:** ```jsx ``` #### Card Component ```jsx // Card structure Title Description Content Footer ``` #### Input Components ```jsx // Input field // Textarea

content.text: Now I'll create a comprehensive interactive HTML showcase that brings this design system to life with the updated warm orange color palette. Let me create the interactive HTML file at `/docs/style-guide-showcase.html`.

input.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>10-box OS Design System Showcase</title>
    <style>
        /* CSS Variables - Updated Warm Orange Palette */
        :root {
            /* Primary Colors (Warm Orange) */
            --primary-50: #fef7f2;
            --primary-100: #fdede3;
            --primary-200: #fbd8c2;
            --primary-300: #f7b896;
            --primary-400: #f18d68;
            --primary-500: #e76d44;
            --primary-600: #D96E4B; /* Main brand color */
            --primary-700: #b85a3a;
            --primary-800: #9a4a31;
            --primary-900: #7e3d2a;
            
            /* Secondary Colors (Neutral Grays) */
            --secondary-50: #f8fafc;
            --secondary-100: #f1f5f9;
            --secondary-200: #e2e8f0;
            --secondary-300: #cbd5e1;
            --secondary-400: #94a3b8;
            --secondary-500: #64748b;
            --secondary-600: #475569;
            --secondary-700: #334155;
            --secondary-800: #1e293b;
            --secondary-900: #0f172a;
            
            /* Semantic Colors */
            --green-50: #f0fdf4;
            --green-100: #dcfce7;
            --green-500: #22c55e;
            --green-600: #16a34a;
            --green-700: #15803d;
            
            --yellow-50: #fefce8;
            --yellow-100: #fef3c7;
            --yellow-500: #eab308;
            --yellow-600: #ca8a04;
            --yellow-700: #a16207;
            
            --red-50: #fef2f2;
            --red-100: #fee2e2;
            --red-500: #ef4444;
            --red-600: #dc2626;
            --red-700: #b91c1c;
            
            --purple-50: #faf5ff;
            --purple-100: #f3e8ff;
            --purple-500: #a855f7;
            --purple-600: #9333ea;
            --purple-700: #7c3aed;
            
            /* Typography */
            --font-family: ui-sans-serif, system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, "Helvetica Neue", Arial, "Noto Sans", sans-serif;
            
            /* Spacing */
            --space-1: 0.25rem;
            --space-2: 0.5rem;
            --space-3: 0.75rem;
            --space-4: 1rem;
            --space-6: 1.5rem;
            --space-8: 2rem;
            
            /* Border Radius */
            --radius-sm: 0.25rem;
            --radius-md: 0.375rem;
            --radius-lg: 0.5rem;
            --radius-xl: 0.75rem;
            
            /* Shadows */
            --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 0.05);
            --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 2px 4px -2px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1);
            --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 4px 6px -4px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1);
        }
        
        /* Reset and Base Styles */
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: var(--font-family);
            line-height: 1.6;
            color: var(--secondary-800);
            background-color: var(--secondary-50);
        }
        
        /* Layout */
        .showcase-container {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: 300px 1fr;
            min-height: 100vh;
        }
        
        .sidebar {
            background: white;
            border-right: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            padding: var(--space-6);
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            height: 100vh;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }
        
        .main-content {
            padding: var(--space-8);
            max-width: 1200px;
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .nav-title {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary-600) 0%, var(--primary-500) 100%);
            background-clip: text;
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            color: transparent;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .nav-list {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .nav-item {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .nav-link {
            display: block;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-600);
            text-decoration: none;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .nav-link:hover, .nav-link.active {
            background-color: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Sections */
        .section {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-8);
            scroll-margin-top: var(--space-8);
        }
        
        .section-title {
            font-size: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            color: var(--secondary-900);
        }
        
        .section-description {
            font-size: 1rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .subsection {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .subsection-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        /* Color Palette */
        .color-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .color-palette {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            padding: var(--space-4);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .palette-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-3);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .color-swatch {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            padding: var(--space-2);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .color-swatch:hover {
            transform: translateX(4px);
        }
        
        .color-sample {
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            margin-right: var(--space-3);
            border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
        }
        
        .color-info {
            flex: 1;
        }
        
        .color-name {
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .color-value {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-500);
            font-family: 'Monaco', 'Menlo', monospace;
        }
        
        /* Typography Scale */
        .typography-samples {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .type-sample {
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            padding: var(--space-3);
            border-left: 3px solid var(--primary-200);
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        .type-label {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--primary-700);
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
        }
        
        .type-text {
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        /* Button Components */
        .button-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .btn {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            text-decoration: none;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            min-height: 40px;
        }
        
        .btn-primary {
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-primary:hover {
            background: var(--primary-700);
            transform: translateY(-1px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary {
            background: var(--secondary-200);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .btn-secondary:hover {
            background: var(--secondary-300);
        }
        
        .btn-outline {
            background: transparent;
            border-color: var(--primary-600);
            color: var(--primary-600);
        }
        
        .btn-outline:hover {
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-ghost {
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        .btn-ghost:hover {
            background: var(--secondary-100);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .btn-destructive {
            background: var(--red-600);
            color: white;
        }
        
        .btn-destructive:hover {
            background: var(--red-700);
        }
        
        .btn-link {
            background: transparent;
            color: var(--primary-600);
            text-decoration: underline;
            text-underline-offset: 4px;
        }
        
        .btn-link:hover {
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Form Elements */
        .form-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .form-group {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .form-label {
            display: block;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            color: var(--secondary-700);
        }
        
        .form-input, .form-textarea, .form-select {
            width: 100%;
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-3);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-300);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
            background: white;
        }
        
        .form-input:focus, .form-textarea:focus, .form-select:focus {
            outline: none;
            border-color: var(--primary-500);
            box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(217, 110, 75, 0.1);
        }
        
        .form-textarea {
            min-height: 80px;
            resize: vertical;
        }
        
        .checkbox-group, .radio-group {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .checkbox-input, .radio-input {
            margin-right: var(--space-2);
            width: 16px;
            height: 16px;
            accent-color: var(--primary-600);
        }
        
        /* Cards */
        .card-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-6);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .card {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            overflow: hidden;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-2px);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
        }
        
        .card-header {
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .card-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
            color: var(--secondary-900);
        }
        
        .card-description {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        .card-content {
            padding: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .card-footer {
            padding: var(--space-6);
            background: var(--secondary-50);
            border-top: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        /* Status Indicators */
        .status-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .status-card {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .status-indicator {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            padding: var(--space-1) var(--space-3);
            border-radius: 9999px;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 500;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .status-completed {
            background: var(--green-50);
            color: var(--green-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--green-200);
        }
        
        .status-incomplete {
            background: var(--yellow-50);
            color: var(--yellow-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--yellow-200);
        }
        
        .status-overdue {
            background: var(--red-50);
            color: var(--red-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--red-200);
        }
        
        .role-teacher {
            background: var(--purple-50);
            color: var(--purple-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--purple-200);
        }
        
        .role-consultant {
            background: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--primary-200);
        }
        
        .role-client {
            background: var(--green-50);
            color: var(--green-700);
            border: 1px solid var(--green-200);
        }
        
        /* Business Logic UI */
        .box-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: var(--space-4);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .box-card {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            text-align: center;
            border: 2px solid var(--secondary-200);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .box-card:hover {
            border-color: var(--primary-300);
            transform: translateY(-2px);
        }
        
        .box-number {
            display: inline-flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 40px;
            height: 40px;
            background: var(--primary-600);
            color: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .box-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
            color: var(--secondary-800);
        }
        
        .box-tasks {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        /* Data Tables */
        .table-container {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            overflow: hidden;
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .table {
            width: 100%;
            border-collapse: collapse;
        }
        
        .table th {
            background: var(--secondary-50);
            padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-4);
            text-align: left;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--secondary-700);
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .table td {
            padding: var(--space-3) var(--space-4);
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .table tbody tr:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        /* Progress Indicators */
        .progress-container {
            background: white;
            padding: var(--space-6);
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            margin-bottom: var(--space-6);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
        }
        
        .progress-bar {
            width: 100%;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--secondary-200);
            border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
            overflow: hidden;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .progress-fill {
            height: 100%;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary-500), var(--primary-600));
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .milestone-list {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .milestone-item {
            display: flex;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
            padding: var(--space-3);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            transition: background 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .milestone-item:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
        }
        
        .milestone-number {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            width: 32px;
            height: 32px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            margin-right: var(--space-3);
            flex-shrink: 0;
        }
        
        .milestone-completed {
            background: var(--green-100);
            color: var(--green-700);
        }
        
        .milestone-current {
            background: var(--primary-100);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        .milestone-pending {
            background: var(--secondary-100);
            color: var(--secondary-500);
        }
        
        .milestone-content {
            flex: 1;
        }
        
        .milestone-title {
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-1);
        }
        
        .milestone-description {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--secondary-600);
        }
        
        /* Interactive Elements */
        .modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 1000;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .modal-overlay.active {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
        }
        
        .modal {
            background: white;
            border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
            padding: var(--space-6);
            max-width: 500px;
            width: 90%;
            transform: scale(0.9);
            transition: transform 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .modal-overlay.active .modal {
            transform: scale(1);
        }
        
        .modal-title {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: var(--space-4);
        }
        
        .modal-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: var(--space-3);
            justify-content: flex-end;
            margin-top: var(--space-6);
        }
        
        .dropdown {
            position: relative;
            display: inline-block;
        }
        
        .dropdown-trigger {
            background: white;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-300);
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            cursor: pointer;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: var(--space-2);
        }
        
        .dropdown-menu {
            position: absolute;
            top: 100%;
            left: 0;
            background: white;
            border: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            border-radius: var(--radius-md);
            box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
            min-width: 200px;
            z-index: 100;
            opacity: 0;
            visibility: hidden;
            transform: translateY(-10px);
            transition: all 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-menu {
            opacity: 1;
            visibility: visible;
            transform: translateY(0);
        }
        
        .dropdown-item {
            padding: var(--space-2) var(--space-4);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.2s ease;
        }
        
        .dropdown-item:hover {
            background: var(--primary-50);
            color: var(--primary-700);
        }
        
        /* Responsive Design */
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .showcase-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .sidebar {
                position: static;
                height: auto;
                border-right: none;
                border-bottom: 1px solid var(--secondary-200);
            }
            
            .main-content {
                padding: var(--space-4);
            }
            
            .color-grid, .button-grid, .form-grid, .card-grid, .status-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .box-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        /* Print Styles */
        @media print {
            .sidebar {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .showcase-container {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .main-content {
                padding: 0;
            }
            
            .card, .form-group, .status-card, .box-card {
                break-inside: avoid;
                box-shadow: none;
                border: 1px solid #ddd;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <div class="showcase-container">
        <!-- Sidebar Navigation -->
        <nav class="sidebar">
            <div class="nav-title">10-box OS Design System</div>
            <ul class="nav-list">
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#colors" class="nav-link active">Color Palette</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#typography" class="nav-link">Typography</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#buttons" class="nav-link">Buttons</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#forms" class="nav-link">Form Elements</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#cards" class="nav-link">Cards</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#status" class="nav-link">Status Indicators</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#business" class="nav-link">Business Logic UI</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#data" class="nav-link">Data Display</a></li>
                <li class="nav-item"><a href="#interactive" class="nav-link">Interactive Elements</a></li>
            </ul>
        </nav>

        <!-- Main Content -->
        <main class="main-content">
            <!-- Color Palette Section -->
            <section id="colors" class="section">
                <h1 class="section-title">Color Palette</h1>
                <p class="section-description">
                    The 10-box OS design system uses a warm orange primary palette with complementary secondary and semantic colors.
                </p>

                <div class="color-grid">
                    <!-- Primary Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">
                        <h3 class="palette-title">Primary (Warm Orange)</h3>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-50);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-50</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fef7f2</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-100);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-100</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fdede3</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-200);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-200</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#fbd8c2</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-600); border: 2px solid var(--primary-700);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-600 (Main Brand)</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#D96E4B</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-700);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-700</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#b85a3a</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--primary-800);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">primary-800</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#9a4a31</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <!-- Secondary Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">
                        <h3 class="palette-title">Secondary (Neutrals)</h3>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-50);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-50</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#f8fafc</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-200);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-200</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#e2e8f0</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-400);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-400</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#94a3b8</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-600);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-600</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#475569</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--secondary-800);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">secondary-800</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#1e293b</div>

                    </div>

                    <!-- Semantic Colors -->
                    <div class="color-palette">

                                <div class="color-value">#22c55e</div>

                        <div class="color-swatch">

                        </div>

                                <div class="color-value">#ef4444</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="color-swatch">
                            <div class="color-sample" style="background: var(--purple-500);"></div>
                            <div class="color-info">
                                <div class="color-name">Teacher Purple</div>
                                <div class="color-value">#a855f7</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Typography Section -->
            <section id="typography" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Typography Scale</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    System font stack with consistent sizing and spacing for optimal readability across devices.
                </p>

                <div class="typography-samples">
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Hero Text (text-5xl md:text-6xl)</div>
                        <h1 class="type-text" style="font-size: 3rem; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.2;">Transform Your Business with the 10-Box Framework</h1>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Section Heading (text-3xl)</div>
                        <h2 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.875rem; font-weight: 700;">Client Acquisition Dashboard</h2>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Card Title (text-2xl)</div>
                        <h3 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 600;">Dream 100 Prospects</h3>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Subtitle (text-xl)</div>
                        <h4 class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.25rem; font-weight: 600;">Daily Task Overview</h4>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Large Body (text-lg)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 1.125rem;">Welcome to your consultant dashboard. Track your progress through the 10-box framework and monitor your client acquisition pipeline.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Default Body (text-base)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 1rem;">This is the standard body text size used throughout the application for most content and interface elements.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Small Text (text-sm)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 0.875rem; color: var(--secondary-600);">Helper text, form labels, and secondary information use this smaller size for improved hierarchy.</p>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="type-sample">
                        <div class="type-label">Extra Small (text-xs)</div>
                        <p class="type-text" style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--secondary-500);">Metadata, timestamps, and fine print use this minimal size.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Buttons Section -->
            <section id="buttons" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Button Components</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Interactive buttons with various styles and states, all featuring the warm orange brand color.
                </p>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Button Variants</h3>
                    <div class="button-grid">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary">Primary Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-secondary">Secondary Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-outline">Outline Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-ghost">Ghost Button</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-destructive">Destructive</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-link">Link Button</button>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <div class="subsection">
                    <h3 class="subsection-title">Business Context Examples</h3>
                    <div class="button-grid">
                        <button class="btn btn-primary">Add Prospect</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-outline">Update Task Status</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-secondary">Export Contacts</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-ghost">View Details</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-destructive">Delete Contact</button>
                        <button class="btn btn-link">View Client Portal</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Form Elements Section -->
            <section id="forms" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Form Elements</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Form components styled with the warm orange focus states and consistent spacing.
                </p>

                <div class="form-grid">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="prospect-name">Prospect Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="prospect-name" class="form-input" placeholder="Enter prospect name..." />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="company">Company</label>
                        <input type="text" id="company" class="form-input" placeholder="Company name..." />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="email">Email Address</label>
                        <input type="email" id="email" class="form-input" placeholder="prospect@company.com" />
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="status">Contact Status</label>
                        <select id="status" class="form-select">
                            <option>Not Contacted</option>
                            <option>Initial Contact</option>
                            <option>Follow-up Scheduled</option>
                            <option>Meeting Booked</option>
                            <option>Proposal Sent</option>
                            <option>Buy Decision</option>
                        </select>
                    </div>
                    
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label" for="notes">Contact Notes</label>

                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label class="form-label">Task Completion</label>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task1" class="checkbox-input" />

                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task2" class="checkbox-input" />
                            <label for="task2">Dream 100 outreach completed</label>
                        </div>
                        <div class="checkbox-group">
                            <input type="checkbox" id="task3" class="checkbox-input" />
                            <label for="task3">Follow-up conversations completed</label>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </section>

            <!-- Cards Section -->
            <section id="cards" class="section">
                <h2 class="section-title">Card Components</h2>
                <p class="section-description">
                    Flexible card layouts for displaying various types of content and data.
                </p>

                <div class="card-grid">
                    <div class="card">
                        <div class="card-header">
                            <h3 class="card-title">Daily Tasks Overview</h3>
                            <p class="card-description">Track your progress through boxes 2-4 of the framework</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card-content">
                            <div style="display: flex; justify-content: space-between; margin-bottom: var(--space-2);">
                                <span>Box 2 (Identify):</span>
                                <span style="color: var(--green-600); font-weight: 600;">5/5 Complete</span>
